testcase.name: user can login with valid credentials

failure.message: expected:<[Herzlich Willkommen in deinem BVG-Konto]!> but was:<[welcome to your BVG account]!>

testcase.failure:
Given user is on login page.................................................passed Given user hovers over language preference and selects Deutsch..............passed When user clicks on email input box and enter email "bvgtester1@gmail.com"..passed And user clicks to password input box and enter password "juniorTester123.".passed And user clicks on 'Sign In' button or hit enter key........................passed And user accepts cookies....................................................passed Then user verifies landing on account page..................................failed
StackTrace: org.junit.ComparisonFailure: expected:<[Herzlich Willkommen in deinem BVG-Konto]!> but was:<[welcome to your BVG account]!> at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:117) at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:146) at com.bvg.step_definitions.LoginStepDefinitions.userVerifiesLandingOnAccountPage(LoginStepDefinitions.java:55) at ✽.user verifies landing on account page(file:///C:/Users/aliek/IdeaProjects/BVG_Project/src/test/resources/features/login.feature:14)

testcase.name: user cannot login with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed Given user hovers over language preference and selects Deutsch..............passed When user inserts the following invalid username "invalid"..................passed And user inserts the following invalid password "invalid"...................passed And user clicks on 'Sign In' button or hit enter key........................passed Then user verifies the following warning message "Ungültiger Benutzername oder Passwort.".passed

testcase.name: user cannot login with no input

failure.message: expected:<[E-Mail und Passwort erforderlich]> but was:<[Ungültiger Benutzername oder Passwort.]>

testcase.failure:
Given user is on login page.................................................passed Given user hovers over language preference and selects Deutsch..............passed When user clicks on 'Sign In' button or hit enter key.......................passed Then user verifies the following warning message or any equivalent message "E-Mail und Passwort erforderlich".failed

testcase.name: user should be able to reset password if forgotten
